name: MARCH
description:
A short first person story about a relationship. Made in the Spring of 2012, in young adulthood.

Controls

WASD to move, SPACE to jump, MOUSE controls aim, ESC (might have to press twice) to pause/restart the game from checkpoint

HEADPHONES highly recommended, and STEREO sound pretty much necessary for some portions.

Credits

Music and some sound sourced from Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com). In order:

  • "Very Low Note" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
  • "Smoother Move" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
  • "Trio for Piano, Cello, and Clarinet" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
  • "Calmant" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
